description: Analyzes current energy/pattern data and calendar availability to suggest 2-3 time-appropriate micro-actions: creative wins, practical reminders, or rest permissions. Incorporates trending social content for easy engagement wins.

suggestions.title: Post your bass reel from Tuesday
suggestions.description: You recorded a great 30-second bass riff on Tuesday. Post it as a Reel with trending audio.
suggestions.reasoning: Short-form music content is trending +30% this week, and your energy is moderate - perfect for a quick win.
suggestions.trending_relevance: Music reels engagement up 30% this week on Instagram

suggestions.title: Check bank account balance
suggestions.description: Quick practical task - review your account before end of day.
suggestions.reasoning: Low-energy practical task that clears mental load.

example_response.overall_energy_assessment: Moderate energy - good for quick creative tasks, avoid deep work
example_response.trending_insights: Short-form music content seeing 30% engagement boost this week
example_response.coaching_note: You've been productive this week. One quick creative win today keeps the momentum going.
